translation.GET_SKINS_AS_GOLD_INFO: EasyTrade.bet delivers the won skins in the form of gold in Standoff 2 until the trading update appears! (We take over the marketplace fee!)

translation.Some mobile browsers don't allow direct: Some mobile browsers don't allow direct downloads. Instead, tap and hold on the image until a dropdown menu appears which allows you to save the image on your device.
